short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows you to share your screen during a samedi Video Consultation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome extenstion to allow the screensharing feature in a samedi Video Consultation.

The samedi GmbH Video Consultation allows doctors and patients to connect through a video call inside the samedi platform. During the video consultation, users can share their screen easily inside the video call. In order for this to work correctly inside Chrome, this extension needs to be installed beforehand.
